description: Number of ways to partition n elements into pie slices each with an odd number of elements.
links: P. Flajolet and M. Soria, The Cycle Construction In SIAM J. Discr. Math., vol. 4 (1), 1991, pp. 58-60.
Index entries for sequences related to necklaces
formula: a(n) = A000358(n)-(1+(-1)^n)/2."CIK" (necklace, indistinct, unlabeled) transform of 1, 0, 1, 0...(odds)G.f. sum(k>=1, phi(k)/k * log( 1/(1-B(x^k)) ) ) where B(x)=x/(1-x^2).  [_Joerg Arndt_, Aug 06 2012]
author: _Christian G. Bower_
